messages.subject: Re: Needing advice: insurance
messages.msgSnippet: -=-=-Check into group health insurance through groups you might belong to - credit unions, for example. Again, make that your job to figure out a way to have
messages.messageBody:
-=-=-Check into group health insurance through groups you might belong to - credit unions, for example. Again, make that your job to figure out a way to have health insurance. Maybe a part-time job with fewer hours that gives you an option to buy into a health insurance program. Do some research.-=-=-=-

And if your husband is self-employed, you might want to look into the Chamber of Commerce.

Not only do they have some really cool resources, programs etc., they also sometimes have a great group insurance policy.

I had one when I owned my own business and Ben was unemployed. Worth every penny!

~Kelly
